# Stephanie Modica

## Who I Am
Stephanie Modica is a Product & Technology Leader based in Miami, Florida (formerly San Francisco). She is a startup CPTO with enterprise experience, specializing in AI-powered systems and product development.

## What I Do
- Build AI products and lead teams that ship
- Transform workflows into AI-powered systems
- Advise early-stage founders on AI product development
- Design and ship agentic AI systems

## Background
- Chief Product & Technology Officer at an AI startup (2022-2025)
- Staff Design Engineer at Visa (2021-2023)
- Senior Manager, Analytics at a Legal Fintech company (2016-2021)
- Harvard University - Graduate Certificate in Data Science
- University of Miami - MBA (magna cum laude)
- University of Miami - BS in Business Law and Art History (cum laude)

## Expertise
- AI/ML product development
- Agentic AI systems and MCP (Model Context Protocol)
- Product leadership and engineering management
- Design systems and data visualization
- Full-stack product development (design, engineering, data)

## Key Achievements
- $13M revenue generated from a single data analysis
- 70% cost reduction through design-led innovation
- Led 10+ engineers and data scientists across 4 time zones
- Built AI systems with MCP architecture before it was mainstream
- Created Visa's first data-driven design analytics function
- Shipped blockchain visualizations to Visa Innovation Centers globally

## Philosophy
- Code is becoming a commodity with AI; what matters now is taste, judgment, and systems thinking
- Prefers building things that actually get used over impressive demos
- Gravitates toward hard problems, curious people, and useful products

- Email: modica.steph@gmail.com

## Location
Miami, Florida, USA (formerly San Francisco)
